content.question: A researcher proposes that the two forms of mosquito are evolving into two different species. Identify ONE potential postzygotic isolating mechanism, and describe how the isolating mechanism would result in the evolution of the two forms into different species.

frqParts.text: A researcher proposes that the two forms of mosquito are evolving into two different species. Identify ONE potential postzygotic isolating mechanism, and describe how the isolating mechanism would result in the evolution of the two forms into different species.
